text:
"Champagne dodges naming Taiwan when pressed to thank nation for mask donation."

Shameful. If the Trudeau government doesn't have the courtesy or courage to thank Taiwan by name, they should send the masks to someone who can.

#Cdnpoli #COVID19 #Taiwan
